etomica.modules.crystalviewer

Class ColorSchemePlane

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.graphics.ColorScheme
      • etomica.modules.crystalviewer.ColorSchemePlane

  • public class ColorSchemePlane
extends ColorScheme
    Colors atoms according to whether or not they are in a plane, as determined by the inPlane method of a Plane instance.
    See Also:
    etomica.lattice.LatticePlane;
